articles.title: X is reportedly blocking links to secure Signal contact pages - Ars Technica
articles.description: Signal has recently become a popular organizing tool among government workers.

articles.author: Adam Rogers
articles.title: Why your aging parents have trouble using their phone - Business Insider
articles.description: Tech gadgets could help us navigate our golden years. Instead, they're making things worse.
articles.content: My stepfather died a few months ago, after a long decade dealing with Parkinson's disease. Doug was living in a care facility, and even though my mom visited all the time, for overall contact with th… [+11451 chars]
